page.title: 18CREDITS
page.content:
Amenities counts for squars 1, 5, 6 & 9, and text pages 1 to 7 (inclusive) are the work of staff and pupils at {Honley C. of E. Junior School} including:- Mr. J. Adrian Calverley, Matthew Ambler, Andrew Jenkin, Janine Buttle, Hannah Dodson, Emma Lydney, Alastair Schtirbo.
Amenities counts for squares 2, 3, 4, 7, 8, 10, 11 & 12, and text pages 8 to 18 are the work of staff and first year pupils at{Honley High School including:- Mr. R. Neil Midgley, Maread Turner, James Hepworth, Catherine Babbings, Sheryl Firth, Rebecca Langford, Tracey Smith, Helen Summerscales, Caroline Kaye, Jonathan Burhouse, Kerry Milner, Nicholas Turner.
PHOTOGRAPHS by{Mr. J. Adrian Calverley
